item.title: Virginia Democrats Voters Side With Assassination Fetishist Jay Jones: ‘Gotta Fight Hardball’
item.description: Virginia's election is on Nov. 4, and Democrat politicians — and voters — are standing by Jay Jones despite his violent texts.

item.title: What Happens When Transgenderism Is No Longer Cool? Prosecutions, Hopefully
item.description: Ideologues foisting the harmful lies of transgenderism onto kids should be laughed -- and prosecuted -- out of polite society.

item.title: ‘Two Bullets’ Jay Jones Says He’s Sorry For Vile Texts, Then Blames Trump
item.description: After apologizing for fantasizing about shooting a GOP lawmaker and cops, Virgina AG candidate Jay Jones says the race is about Trump.

item.title: Miyares: If Jones Were Actually Sorry For Murder Fantasies, He Wouldn’t Be Running
item.description: Republican Jason Miyares said Thursday during the Virginia attorney general debate that his Democrat opponent Jay Jones would drop out of the race if ...

item.title: John Bolton Indicted On 18 Counts For Mishandling Classified Information
item.description: Bolton abused his position as national security advisor by sharing and retaining top secret classified information, the indictment alleges.
